name: TAXI MANIA: Refueled
description:
Dash and crash through traffic!

Taxi Mania: Refueled is a thrilling infinite runner where you must avoid oncoming traffic for as long as you can!

Use abilities to your advantage!

You can find abilities that you can pick up and use to stay ahead of the traffic.

Boost

Gain a speed increase and invulnerability for 2 seconds

Missile

Shoot a missile that will destroy all obstacles in front of you

Slow Motion

Slow down time for 2 seconds

Compete to be the best!

Try to achieve the highest score on the Scoreboard!

Made by Marko Borojevic

https://markoborojevic.com/
